definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)
corporal punishment (such as castration or amputation)
whipping with bamboo strips (as corporal punishment)
to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)
to treat as guilty those associated with an offender (family, neighbors etc)
to involve others (in a crime)/guilt by association
strict law/cruel punishment/to carry out cruel law rigorously

historical communal administrative and self-defence system created during the Song Dynasty and revived during the Republican Era, in which households are grouped in jia 甲[jia3] and jia are grouped in bao 保[bao3]
